attacks.name: Ember
attacks.effect: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Quilava in order to use this attack.

attacks.name: Fire Wind
attacks.effect: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, choose 1 of them. Flip 2 coins. For each heads, this attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.)
